title: Mens Long Sleeve Polo Shirts Casual Fashion Button Up Collared Golf T Shirts with Pocket
description: Material: These polo shirts for men are made of cotton blend fabric which is soft, breathable, comfortable, lightweight, stretchy and skin friendly. Do not shrink and fade.
Feature: Regular fit, contrast collar, front chest pocket, 3 button closure, solid color, long sleeve polo shirts for men.
Matching: Classic and casual. You can match this mens long sleeve shirt with jeans, jacket, sneakers, pants.
Occasion: These long sleeve shirts for men are perfect for spring, fall, winter. Suitable for work, sports, vacation, beach, lounge.
Garment Care: These mens long sleeve tee shirts are machine washable. Standard US size, please choose your size refer to the size information before ordering.
